10:13 <helge> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <polx> has quit  
10:15 <helge> tmortagne: Hi Thomas, just want to give feedback that wiki stream export was fine after the fixes you provided. However, seams like attachments are not exported with versions (history).  
10:16 <tmortagne> helge: how do you see that ?  
10:17 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:20 <helge> tmortagne: click on the small version number next to the attachment. Original page shows a list of all versions of the attachment. Imported page shows only the latest version.  
10:30 <tmortagne> helge: would be great if you could create a jira issue with step to reproduce it  
10:30 <tmortagne> \*steps  
10:32 <helge> tmortagne: ok. sorry for being lazy. Another thing playing around with XE6M2  
10:33 <helge> after creating a subwiki I can not create anotherone. click on Add -> Wiki gets me a "page does not exist"  
10:34 <tmortagne> are you doing it from main wiki or subwiki (calling Add -> Wiki) ?  
10:35 <helge> tried both. no difference.  
10:35 <tmortagne> sounds like a bug, it's in 6M2 right ?  
10:35 <helge> sorry, there was actually a difference. doing it from main wiki brings up a "internal error" message.  
10:35 <helge> yes, 6M2  
10:36 <tmortagne> a jira issue with your database/appserver etc would be nice again then  
10:37 <helge> shure. hopefully tonight. :) regards.  
10:37 <tmortagne> (BTW if you test 6M2 on purpose it's great but note that this is a beta version)  
10:39 <vmassol> has quit  
10:40 <helge> of course, no complains. Just a hint so it won't escape your notice... :)  
10:41 <helge> ... for the final release, I mean.  
10:45 <helge> has quit
